website_summaries.verdict: The best budget monitor from BenQ for people needing a decent, all-purpose display.
pros: 21.5" screen is small enough to fit into tight spaces without feeling too small
Color reproduction is good for most computer activities
Comes with a low blue light model for night use
cons: Higher levels of glare are common during use in the day time or under bright lights

customer_reviews.title: Must have for migraine sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I'm a migraine sufferer and work on dual monitors at least 40 hours a week. I was hesitant about buying new computer screens since I needed 2 but I was desperate to deter any and all migraine triggers. I went ahead and bought these not expecting much of a difference but I am shocked. I keep my screen brightness extremely low since I have photophobia with my migraines and even with the brightness on 5, everything is crisp, clear and easy to read. My eye fatigue has decreased dramatically along with my migraines. If you suffer from migraines and have to be on a computer often, it is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: sewingdame87

customer_reviews.title: great on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: bought these cause i suffer from the common pwm effects on newer devices that utilize it. with pwm, i literally cannot look at a screen for more than 5 minutes before my eyes ache. I can now stare at the monitor for 12 hours without issue. Built in blue light reduction is nice since I cannot change the settings on my work laptop. I know some programs do this automatically but for organizations that lock down their machine this is a nice way around it without using the blue light filtering glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Petricini

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Ordering was easy, arrival on time, and produce exactly as described. However..... three weeks later and there are three rows of dead pixels. Not individual pixels, whole rows of them from top of the screen to the bottom. I understand that these kinds of monitors suffer from the occasional dead pixel, but a whole row of them is something else entirely. I am not going to bash the brand, just this particular model. If you are looking at one of these I would recommend you don't. Spend a few extra bucks and get something else, something better.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: BenQ a long-time winner for me
customer_reviews.text: Excellent no frills monitor. It is replacing an old BenQ 21" monitor I had been using since the days of Windows XP. I bought the 24" version. It is definitely sturdy and doesn't wobble while I'm typing, which is important since my job requires me to type for long periods of time. Compared to more expensive models and brands that I looked at when at Office Max, this monitor beats them, hands down. Matte screen and viewing angle are excellent. No room reflections.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martini

customer_reviews.title: Decent value monitors for gaming
customer_reviews.text: They feel cheap in a number of ways, from the screen and plastic materials, to the weight and color balance. It's an excellent value gaming monitor though, if you are on a budget, but still want to hit all of the minimum specs for serious gaming. Definitely 5 stars for value, but 3 for quality, seems to average to a 4 overall for me, as long as you want that value.
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and works great. some people were complaining about a yellow tint or something, all you need to do is up the contrast. There is only one problem. the rim of the monitor overlaps a few rows of pixels on the monitor so you cant exactly see tiny bit of your screen. its not big deal overall it just gets a bit annoying not knowing how many tabs you have open on the windows 10 task bar. Amazing for the price though!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, budget VA screen
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice, budget VA screen. Has some light bleeding at the left and rigth edges, but for this price you cannot complain. No dead pixels, no cross-hatching. Fairly sturdy, typical IPS angles of view, good unifirmity, decent colour reproduction, colour temperature almost ideal. It is really nice to work/watch movies using this screen. If I need another monitor, I would order this one.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, performs great.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. Took a minute to get the colors good but it looks better than i expected. Bezels are even smaller than i was hoping for, and the stand is sturdy. Only problem I encountered was fitting a DVI to HDMI adapter. This won't pose much of an issue for most people but the DVI adapter was a little large, and there is a ledge that prevents both the hdmi cable and dvi adapter to fit well. It fits and works perfectly fine but it is not 100% secure. Overall great monitor and this was my fault for not doing proper research, so I didn't deduct any stars. Would 100% recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: abglon

customer_reviews.title: I am not the most inept at calibration, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not the most inept at calibration, but I have the basics down. This monitor's color are a bit washed and the white's were more of a light grayish. Not appealing at all. May have been my monitor alone, but roll the dice with this one.
customer_reviews.author: To Be Continued

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third or fourth BenQ monitor I have purchased on Amazon. I love them. All are still working. They work without me thinking aboout it. Always on, always clear, always bright. Very little glare on the screen. I have Monoprice mounts on all of them. The mounts are too short for me. I am sure you will be satisfied with a BenQ purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. West

customer_reviews.title: Good secondary or office PC monitor
customer_reviews.text: This BenQ GW2270 has good contrast ratio, good colors and great value at the $90. One of the cheapest monitors you can buy that includes a VESA mount, which is can come in handy if used with multiple monitors. The one thing I wouldn't recommend using it as, would be as a gaming monitor. It has a very low pixel response time creates visible trailing during fast movement.
customer_reviews.author: Zach V.

customer_reviews.title: Noticied a difference in my eye strain with the low blue light feature.
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a improvement in my issues with the blue light syndrome. I am a tech so on my computer for long hours. This monitor has really helped with my eye strain. And the quality of the picture is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Oberg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen audio isn't fantastic though.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a year now. Really like it, I think if i could go back I probably would get the newer model without the audio ports and just use speakers, but still if you don't have the room its a good monitor. The Jump from 720 to 1080 was a real eye popper for me.
customer_reviews.author: Al Borland

customer_reviews.title: Good for its price
customer_reviews.text: Good for its price. Has a matte finish, which I strongly prefer. Good color quality when using DVI and some nice software features.
customer_reviews.author: deathbyfreezeray

customer_reviews.title: FYI: No USB PORT
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. Didnt have usb port, was easily remedied with a $6 adapter. Not 4k quality, but works for gaming etc. No issues thus far and its running several hours a day for my gamer...would recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Valle-Zelaya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and probably should cost twice as much
customer_reviews.text: Loving these monitors. Bought a pair and extremely happy with the quality, sharpness and response time of these displays. Well made and excellent quality monitors that will not disappoint or break the bank. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vega

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor as a gift, I ordered it a month before which means when I found out it didn't work I could no longer return it due to the STUPID 30 day return policy. I would not recommend this monitor to anyone-- the screen quality is terrible and it doesn't even work for gaming! I am extremely disappointed and aggravated with BENQ and all of their products. Do not buy this, you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ben-Q is my friend! It's a bright screen, ...
customer_reviews.text: Ben-Q is my friend! It's a bright screen, adjusts to nearly any computer (I have a newer laptop, on Win 10, and an older desktop, with Win 7). I plan to purchase a second one, for the other computer--and it will be another Ben Q!
customer_reviews.author: Mohabee Serrano

customer_reviews.title: good little monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good little monitor for the price. I purchased a second one so I could have two screens when i work from home. I don't use it much after 5pm but the blue light reduction does save my eyes from getting so tired.
customer_reviews.author: rose nett

customer_reviews.title: Good if you need another monitor for your display
customer_reviews.text: Good if you need another monitor for your display. I use a 144hz monitor for my primary though, I use this monitor for watching anime or documentaries or having other windows open. Easy to assemble, comes in with no dead pixels, pretty solid for the price and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor was bigger than I imagined (a plus). The color and clarity are great. Simple to plug in and adjust to the PC. Made a very old PC seem brand new.
customer_reviews.author: D E

customer_reviews.title: Solid no frills monitor that does its job
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor - does not have HDMI but does have DVI-D so it was plug and play into my video card. Nice refresh rate, no blur on Battlefield 1, no flicker just a nice solid no frills monitor that is 1080 I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa D

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is a nice and bright display, ready for videos, music, and gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Durham

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these monitors to anyone looking for top quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son to go with his new computer since I have had mine for over a year and adore it. I highly recommend these monitors to anyone looking for top quality!
customer_reviews.author: Raylene Rutland

customer_reviews.title: buy these they are great
customer_reviews.text: everyone who makes it a 2 star because of no hdmi all you have to do is buy a dvi to hdmi cord but overall i have two of these they are great buy

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Literally had to jump through a lot of hoops and buy alot of wires to get mine to work. This only comes with a DVI Port and a D-Sub Port. For the price its amazing, but if you want more ports IE: USB and HDMI look for a different Monitor

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a great monitor

customer_reviews.title: perfect for gaming

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, made a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this new after considering a few used ones for about the same price. Glad I did. It was for a gift that was gladly received.

customer_reviews.title: good monitor
customer_reviews.text: good quality, works great, just wish I would have bought one with hdmi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great color and picture. I do consider BENQ to be a top competitor, if not the best for competitive gaming

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Made in upgrade from a 1280x1024 HP Compaq, and this is incredible. Great colors, great anti-bluelight functionality. Menu is easy to navigate, bezel is thin enough, matte screen is always a plus. Everything sharp and clear, very bright as well. The 3000:1 contrast is really noticable. Very pleased with this purchase, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was very easy to figure out from the get-go. The picture is excellent, and controls easy to understand. Easy to assemble, and adjust.

customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Plus there seem to be fewer and fewer monitors with DVI ports.

customer_reviews.title: it looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: Well, it looks good and works well. I have it connected to the VGA output of my PC so don't know if the resolution would be any better, but I'd buy it again. The picture is as good as my 1080p TV. Now I just need to figure out how to dispose of my old broken monitor.
customer_reviews.author: William S Chilcoat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very easy to install and excellent picture.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. I have 3 and will be getting another soon. Not sure about the sound none of mine have speakers or any audio jacks that I am aware of.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value wide screen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value wide screen. One of the best screens I have bought.

customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. Got it for $89 sale price. Sturdy, easy to use and looks great. Would buy agian. Ended up buying two of them.

customer_reviews.text: The colors on this monitor are great, and although I am not a snob when it comes to monitors, this is a great monitor for the price.

customer_reviews.text: Great picture. But has some weird feedback flutter that happens occasionally. Does it on every pc I hook it up to. When it doesn't do it it's a nice clear image. My wife uses it. She doesn't seem to complain about it. So I guess it's doable.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy under any circumstance
customer_reviews.text: Easily the worst monitor I've ever used. Quickly moving objects change color, probably because the monitor's colors don't have a properly synced update. Everything is really fuzzy so text is challenging to read. The chassis isn't even wide enough so there's about 7 pixels that aren't visible, regardless of how you set the horizontal position.

customer_reviews.title: durable monitor

customer_reviews.author: A. different Drummer

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you want a cheap high quality monitor, this monitor is the perfect choice. I only have 1 issue and it's that my monitor doesn't come with a HDMI port. The manual says that you could plugin the wire which you would use for its respectable port and it showed D-SUB, D-VI (male to male), and HDMI. This monitor (My monitor) did not have a HDMI option and I didn't have a D-VI cord so I had to wait longer to use it. This package came in one day (did not pay extra for 1 day shipping). All in all this is a good monitor for $80.

product_meta.title: BenQ Monitor GW2270 22 inch 1080p Monitor | Optimized for Home Office with Low Blue Light technology
product_meta.description:
View crisp, clear content with this 21.5-inch BenQ LED VA monitor. This flicker-free monitor provides a 3000:1 contrast ratio and a 178-degree viewing angle to keep screen images clear and visible no matter where you sit. Low Blue Light mode and 8-bit color performance let you watch video without distortion on this 21.5-inch BenQ LED VA monitor. The brightness is 250 cd/㎡

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The GW2270 VA LED monitor brings viewing pleasure to everyday work and play with exquisite Details on the exterior and striking visual performance delivered by 3000:1 High contrast ratio, 178 Degree/178 Degreewide-viewing angle and BenQ eye-caring design, which consists of BenQ flicker-free technology and low Blue light modes.
feature_bullets: 21.5" widescreen flat-panel LED monitor. No HDMI input
1920 x 1080 resolution: Delivers crystal-clear picture quality with stunning detail. Flicker-free Backlight for Visual Pleasure
True 8-Bit Color Panel with over 16 Million color depth

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars463 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
